name: adherant-backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:document" "npm run dev:profile" "npm run dev:property" "npm run dev:transaction"
scripts.db:reset: sequelize-cli db:drop && sequelize-cli db:create && sequelize-cli db:migrate && sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../document-service && npm install && cd ../profile-service && npm install && cd ../property-service && npm install && cd ../transaction-service && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd services/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../auth-service && npm run build && cd ../document-service && npm run build && cd ../profile-service && npm run build && cd ../property-service && npm run build && cd ../transaction-service && npm run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:document" "npm run start:profile" "npm run start:property" "npm run start:transaction"
scripts.test:all: cd services/api-gateway && npm test && cd ../auth-service && npm test && cd ../document-service && npm test && cd ../profile-service && npm test && cd ../property-service && npm test && cd ../transaction-service && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd services/api-gateway && npm run lint && cd ../auth-service && npm run lint && cd ../document-service && npm run lint && cd ../profile-service && npm run lint && cd ../property-service && npm run lint && cd ../transaction-service && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf services/*/node_modules services/*/dist && npm run clean:root
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:all

author: IT Road Group
description: Adherant Real Estate Platform - Microservices Backend
